help-file.title: SKILL_CONJURER
help-file.content:
The following is a list of all the skills and spell available to the Conjurer class:
Skills --------------------------------------------------------------------------- 1st level: 1h bludgeon, 1h piercing, 2h bludgeon, bandage, carve, climb, dodge, first aid, fishing, meditate, mine, mount, quick chant, retreat, scribe, sorcerous spell knowledge, swim
Spells --------------------------------------------------------------------------- 1st circle: Detect Magic, Magic Missile, Minor Creation 2nd circle: Burning Hands, Chill Touch, Mirror Image, Sleep 3rd circle: Concealment, Dexterity, Dispel Magic, Mage Flame, Shocking Grasp, Strength 4th circle: Infravision, Levitate, Lightning Bolt, Ray of Enfeeblement, Reveal True Name, Weapon Enchantment 5th circle: Coldshield, Conjure Elemental, Fireshield, Identify, Sense Follower, Slowness, Wall of Stone 6th circle: Color Spray, Feeblemind, Minor Globe of Invulnerability, Stone Skin, Teleport, Wall of Iron 7th circle: Airy Water, Cone of Cold, Dimension Door, Fireball, Haste, Ice Storm, Stornogs Metamagic Shroud, Wall of Flames, Wall of Ice, Web 8th circle: Globe of Invulnerability, Improved Invisibility, Prismatic Ray Prismatic Spray, Wall of Force 9th circle: Detect Invisibility, Disintegrate, Fly, Gate, Relocate 10th circle: Farsee, Group Stone Skin, Stornogs Shimmering Starshell 11th circle: Conjure Greater Elemental, Group Globe of Invulnerability Prismatic Cube, Stornogs Spheres 12th circle: Group Stornogs Spheres
Conjurer Specializations --------------------------------------------------------------------------- Air Magus, Fire Magus, Earth Magus, Water Magus
